title: Lakshmi Diamond Jhumka: A Symphony of Tradition and Sparkle
materials: Burmese Ruby accents. Features traditional Hyderabadi Polish (హైదరాబాదీ మెరుగు) for a lasting lustre.
features: Classic bell-shaped Jhumka design inspired by temple architecture, embellished with intricate filigree work. The earrings feature a floral motif top suspending a diamond studded dome adorned with a central Ruby. Finished with delicate gold bead drops (గుండ్ల డిజైన్) for added movement and sparkle. Features a secure screw-back closure.
colors: and passionate Red Rubies create a rich and timeless color palette.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to showcase your heritage and style. Ideal for traditional ceremonies like Seemantham (సీమంతం) or a Half-Saree function (లంగా ఓణీ వేడుక).
description: Experience the timeless elegance of South Indian craftsmanship with these stunning Diamond Jhumkas. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, these earrings blend traditional design with modern sparkle. The combination of 22K gold, brilliant-cut diamonds, and vibrant rubies makes these a treasured heirloom. Invest in a piece that celebrates your cultural heritage and adds a touch of luxury to any ensemble. Symbolizes prosperity and good fortune.
